tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE site_visits_and_meetings (
  visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  visit_date DATE,
  purpose VARCHAR(200),
  meeting_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE site_visits (
  visit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  visit_date DATE NOT NULL,
  client_id INT NOT NULL,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  duration_hrs DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE client_meetings (
  meeting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
  client_id INT NOT NULL,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  meeting_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SiteVisits (
  visit_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  visit_date DATE,
  client_id INT,
  project_id INT,
  visit_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClientMeetings (
  meeting_id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE,
  client_id INT,
  project_id INT,
  meeting_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE site_visits (
  visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  visit_date DATE,
  visit_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE client_meetings (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE project_development (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT,
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE client_interaction (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type TEXT,
  interaction_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE site_visits (
    visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    visit_date DATE,
    visit_time TIME,
    client_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE client_meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    client_id INT,
    project_id INT,
    meeting_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
